_header: When the feast of Pase approached near
_description: Gospel for Tuesday after the Fourth Sunday in Lent, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: When þe fest of pase approched nereþat with þe iews was halden dere…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …And efterward þai war baptistAnd trewly trowed in ihesu Crist
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Iam die festo mediante.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: fferia iii post dominicam iiii quadragesime Secundum Iohannem (rubric, f. 57rb)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984):  II.114-118.
